Workflow.Name: Mark children's presents for a gift category as added to Santa's sleigh
Workflow.Description: Cloud flow called from a canvas app to set the status reason of children's presents of the considered gift category to "Present in Santa's sleigh".

LocalizedName.description: Mark children's presents for a gift category as added to Santa's sleigh

Description.description: Cloud flow called from a canvas app to set the status reason of children's presents of the considered gift category to "Present in Santa's sleigh".
